item.description:
This meetup just started. They have 12 people that have rsvp'd yes for there first meetup! It would be a good idea to meet some like minded people to work together with.
http://www.meetup.com...
" We will be meeting to discuss active options for spreading awareness. We may do some flyering depending on weather so please wear weather-appropriate attire. Please bring whatever you have to offer the group, information, dvds, flyers, etc. also, I will be picking a venue in which we will have access to wifi, so bring a laptop if you have one. Guests are welcome! "
Location
Borders Cafe, upstairs

10-24 School St.
corner of Washington and School St.
Boston, MA 02135

Here are the Zeitgeist films that can be seen for free online:

Zeitgeist, The Movie - Remastered / Final Edition
2:02:15 - 1 year ago
ZEITGEIST, The Movie - Remastered / Final Edition - Full Production. What does Christianity, 911 and The Federal Reserve all have in common?
http://video.google.c...

Zeitgeist: Addendum
2:03:07 - 1 year ago
Zeitgeist: Addendum, by Peter Joseph 2008
http://video.google.c...

This is the official web site for the films:
http://www.zeitgeistm...

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth
